name: Rough Ruskis
description:
A thrilling and dangerous journey through the imagination and bedroom of a small soviet child in the dark days of the cold war. You'll play through a maze of buzz-saws, spike pits and quick paced platformed puzzles to excite and delight.  

UPDATED: Fixed export issue, runs on any windows machine.

1 Player

WASD - Movement control

Mouse Required - Spawn Jump

R - Respawn
